data.title: Best Movies Like No Way Out
meta_keywords: movies similar to No Way Out
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to No Way Out: Enemy of the State (1998), Basic (2003), The Firm (1993), The Interpreter (2005), The General's Daughter (1999), Gorky Park (1983), Derailed (2005), The Manchurian Candidate (2004), Color of Night (1994), Company Business (1991)

Story: Navy Lt. Tom Farrell meets a young woman, Susan Atwell , and they share a passionate fling. Farrell then finds out that his superior, Defense Secretary David Brice, is also romantically involved with Atwell. When the young woman turns up dead, Farrell is put in charge of the murder investigation. He begins to uncover shocking clues about the case, but when details of his encounter with Susan surface, he becomes a suspect as well.
